group_1.textRight: ...Ahh, it's you.@Hozumi, I believe your name was?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes... umm.@You are Kanagi, aren't you.

group_1.textRight: Mm,  we've met face to face once or twice.
Incidentally...@what brings you to a place like this?

group_1.textLeft: Nothing... for some reason...@I just, want to be alone.

group_1.textRight: ...This may indeed be the best place for that.@Very little noise, for one thing.
You can think clearly, feeling nothing but nature...@the wind, the voices of insects, the smell of the earth.

group_1.textLeft: Does that mean, you also visit here to think...?

group_1.textRight: I think about those that have passed on, while@feeling the work and continuous changes of nature..
It's a law of Nature that the world is always flowing,@and all life must end one day.
But Magical Girls, and those who lose their lives in Witch attacks...
They perish outside of Nature, disconnected from it.
The thought of that makes me especially aware of@how important it is to protect those lives.
Even if those lives will still be lost some day,@regardless.

group_1.textLeft: There's nothing you can do about it...

group_1.textCenter: Her Soul Gem...@This is bad...
I was trying to tell her that that's why I feel so@strongly
about protecting everything I have now, but...@it's rather difficult, I suppose...
...This is concerning.@I should inform Yakumo about it.
(I... really shouldn't have acted like that...)
(I, just ran away.)
(A message...?)

group_1.narration: Heey, heey!@Are you at the cafe right now?@We're all thinking of going together right now,@but is that OK?

group_1.textCenter: (For some reason...@I just don't feel like replying...)
(...Again?)

group_1.narration: Also also, today we met Hinano,@we all took pictures together!@Next time let's take a picture with everyone, okay!

group_1.textCenter: (I should be happy that my friends are making more friends, but...)
(...I'm such a jerk...)
(It's about time to go home.)
(But my legs feel too heavy to do that.)
Eh... Ryo?@Why...

group_1.narration: Shizuku, sorry to keep bugging you.
Mitama just passed on a message from Kanagi;@she said she saw you in Daito.

She said it seemed like something was bothering you,@so I just got a little worried.@You can wait until you're done shopping or feeling more calm,@but I'd be happy if you could send me a quick message later.

group_1.textCenter: ...Why am I, still running away.@I even turned my smartphone off...
Even though they're worried,
why am I willingly leaving such an important place behind...?
I, always do.

group_1.narration: I always abandon the places that matter to me.@It was the same back when I fought with Ayaka and ran away.
And I know there were other factors at play,@but I still left Ryo and Ikumi of my own accord.
Doubting myself over nothing, getting angry over nothing,@finally finding a place to belong only to leave it behind--@how can I say "I want a place to belong" when I act like this?
Besides, I don't even know what I'm looking for.@I can't face everyone like this any more.@There's nowhere for me to return to.

group_1.textCenter: No matter what I do,@I'll lose everything.
(The way I am now,@I'll never find a place for myself again.)
